name: Museum of Other Realities
descr:
The Museum of Other Realities (MOR) is an immersive multiplayer art showcase in VR. Step into a painting, surround yourself with fantastic sounds, experience art with your friends as it evolves and takes form. The museum contains a growing collection of interactive art and experimentation, supporting artists who are challenging and redefining what is possible with virtual reality art.


[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/613900/extras/Night_Snow_telport_into_border.gif?t=1638911779[/img]
(Night Snow by Danny Bittman)[h2]Multiplayer[/h2]Enjoy a collective multiplayer experience with old friends or make new ones in a gallery you can visit from anywhere.


[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/613900/extras/Immateria_Steam_2.gif?t=1638911779[/img]
(Immateria by Isaac Cohen)[h2]Constantly evolving with new art [/h2]With regular art updates and events on an ongoing basis, the MOR grows and evolves into a space you can return to for new experiences.
 

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/613900/extras/Devalaya_Steam_2.gif?t=1638911779[/img]
(Devalaya Rupanam by Kevin Mack)[h2]Supporting Artists[/h2]
The MOR has showcased pieces from artists around the world, celebrating their incredible work and fostering community. Artists with featured work in the Museum are paid and promoted.


[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/613900/extras/MOR_Index_Drawing.gif?t=1638911779[/img][h2]Valve Index Support[/h2]
The MOR supports the Valve Index and Index controllers, allowing you to gesture to friends or draw in the air.
detail:
名称: Museum of Other Realities
类型: 休闲, 模拟
开发商: MOR Museum Inc.
发行商: MOR Museum Inc.
发行日期: 2020 年 2 月 26 日
抢先体验发行日期: 2019 年 6 月 28 日
review: 全部评测: 特别好评 (402) - 此游戏的 402 篇用户评测中有 91% 为好评。
全部评测: 特别好评 (402 篇中的 91%) 发布至今
sysreq:
Windows
最低配置:
需要 64 位处理器和操作系统
操作系统 *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
处理器: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
内存: 4 GB RAM
显卡: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
网络: 宽带互联网连接
存储空间: 需要 4 GB 可用空间
支持 VR: SteamVR or Oculus PC
附注事项: 1x USB 2.0 or newer, HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2 or newer
推荐配置:
需要 64 位处理器和操作系统
*
2024 年 1 月 1 日（PT）起，Steam 客户端将仅支持 Windows 10 及更新版本。
